product_name: Mavic Ksyrium Pro Disc Wheelset with Tires
long_description: Built for pure performance, the featherweight Mavic Ksyrium Pro Disc Wheelset is stiff and responsive to deliver maximum speed and is compatible with disc brakes for equally responsive stopping power.
short_description: Built for pure performance, the featherweight Mavic Ksyrium Pro Disc Wheelset is stiff and responsive to deliver maximum speed and is compatible with disc brakes for equally responsive stopping power.
